version_description:
- New: followed albums view
- Fixed: bugs with rating
- Prepared for iOS10
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- New: scroll to top of newsfeed while taping on newsfeed icon
- Improved: PayPal verification
- Improved: displaying newsfeed content
- Fixed: search country during filling profile data process.
- Fixed: big app size issue

Fixed:
- a bug that made the size of the app increase endlessly.
- crashes

- New: when taping newsfeed icon scrolls top to the beginning of newsfeed.
- Improved: handling notifications.
- Improved: Paypal verification.
- Improved: search country during filling profile data process.
- Fixed: crash on mission screen.
- New achievements
- Bug fixes

- New: better support for iPad
- Improved: Manage Photos section - with Visibility meter showing percentage of photos that are easily findable for photo buyers
- Improved: search on Manage photos, Missions and Explore sections
- Fixed: Mission and Album tab selection after app is going to background
- Fixed: sharing on Twitter
- Fixed: Mission details screen was showing wrong days left communicate while mission was in "To be rewarded" state.
The app has been translated to Russian, Portuguese, Spanish and German

- The app has been translated to Russian, Portuguese, Spanish and German
- Fixed a crash for devices using iOS 9
- The app has been translated to Russian, Portuguese, Spanish and German

Life's just got easier! From now on you no longer have to have your PayPal account verified to start. Ta-dam!

Don't delete your PayPal account, though. PayPal does remain our way to send you the money for your amazing snaps!

Life's just got easier! From now on you no longer have to have your PayPal account verified to start. Ta-dam!

Don't delete your PayPal account, though. PayPal does remain our way to send you the money for your amazing snaps!

Goal : UX/UI stardom!
Mission: New onboarding and changes in the UI. To make everything nicer, faster and better, we introduced a few changes in the app.
Result: We got excited, hope you like it too!
- Added: support for new HEIF image format introduced in iOS11
Just because we love our job, we are ready with an update to support the lucky iPhoneX users. Happy Foaping and tell us if you like it!
Crash masterminds at Foap managed to overcome some unexpected bugs and improved Twitter share fluency!
News of the year! Enjoy the new photo upload in the app. Like it? Test it. Use it!
